statements: SELECT * FROM content_files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM content_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM content_files ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM content_files WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_id, file_name, upload_date FROM content_files ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM content_files WHERE file_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM content_files WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' AND upload_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM content_files WHERE file_path LIKE '/uploads%';
SELECT AVG(file_size) AS average_size, MAX(file_size) AS max_size FROM content_files;
SELECT * FROM content_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM content_files WHERE file_id = 1;
SELECT file_id, created_at FROM content_files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM content_files WHERE file_type LIKE '%image%';
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM content_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM content_files WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM content_files WHERE file_size > 10000 AND file_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT file_id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM content_files LEFT JOIN file_metadata ON content_files.file_id = file_metadata.file_id WHERE metadata_key = 'author';
SELECT file_id, file_name, created_at FROM content_files WHERE file_id IN (SELECT file_id FROM file_metadata WHERE metadata_value = 'public');
SELECT * FROM content_files WHERE file_type LIKE '%video%' AND file_size > 500000 ORDER BY file_size ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_path FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, tag_name FROM files INNER JOIN file_tags ON files.id = file_tags.file_id INNER JOIN tags ON file_tags.tag_id = tags.id;
SELECT file_name, created_at FROM files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, file_name, file_path FROM files JOIN file_tags ON files.id = file_tags.file_id WHERE file_tags.tag_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, file_size, created_at FROM files WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31' ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT files.file_name, tags.tag_name FROM files JOIN file_tags ON files.id = file_tags.file_id JOIN tags ON file_tags.tag_id = tags.id;
SELECT AVG(file_size) AS average_size, MAX(file_size) AS max_size, MIN(file_size) AS min_size FROM files;
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE file_type = 'image/jpeg';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY file_name ASC
SELECT f.file_name, c.category_name FROM files f JOIN file_mappings fm ON f.file_id = fm.file_id JOIN categories c ON fm.category_id = c.category_id
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(fm.mapping_id) AS file_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN file_mappings fm ON u.user_id = fm.file_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email HAVING file_count > 5

SELECT category_name, COUNT(fm.mapping_id) AS file_count FROM categories c JOIN file_mappings fm ON c.category_id = fm.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING file_count > 10 ORDER BY file_count DESC
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_type='image';
SELECT file_name, file_path, tag_name FROM files f JOIN file_metadata fm ON f.file_id = fm.file_id JOIN file_tags ft ON fm.tag_id = ft.tag_id;
SELECT file_name, permission_type FROM files f JOIN file_permissions fp ON f.file_id = fp.file_id WHERE permission_type='public';
SELECT * FROM files;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM files WHERE file_type='image';
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;

SELECT f.file_name, fc.category_name, ft.tag_name FROM files f JOIN file_metadata fm ON f.file_id = fm.file_id JOIN file_categories fc ON fm.category_id = fc.category_id JOIN file_tags ft ON fm.tag_id = ft.tag_id;
SELECT f.file_name, fp.permission_type FROM files f JOIN file_permissions fp ON f.file_id = fp.file_id WHERE fp.permission_type='public';
